title._content: Photograph of 1940 Truman Senate Campaign Rally, 1940

description._content: Original Caption: Photograph of 1940 Truman Senate Campaign Rally, 1940 Created By: National Archives and Records Administration. Office of Presidential Libraries. Harry S. Truman Library. (04/01/1985 - ) From: Series: Photographs Relating to the Administration, Family, and Personal Life of Harry S. Truman, compiled 1957 - 2004, documenting the period 1849 - 2004 Contact: Harry S. Truman Library (NLHST), 500 West U.S. Highway 24, Independence, MO, 64050-1798. PHONE: 816-268-8272; FAX: 816-268-8295; EMAIL:truman.reference@nara.gov. Production Dates: 1940 Scope and Content Note: Foreground, from left to right: Mrs. Bess W. Truman, Margaret Truman, and Victor Messall at a campaign rally in Sedalia, Missouri to kick of Senator Harry S. Truman's 1940 reelection campaign. Victor Messall was one of Senator Truman's secretaries and his campaign manager at the time this photo was taken. All others are unidentified. Persistent URL: arcweb.archives.gov/arc/action/ExternalIdSearch?id=6233750 Truman Library URL: www.trumanlibrary.org/photographs/view.php?id=44308&rr= Access Restrictions: Unrestricted Use Restrictions: Unrestricted
